name: SARIS Lemon Balm Floral Water (Melissa officinalis)
description: SARIS Lemon Balm Floral Water (Melissa officinalis) is a natural lemon balm floral water produced by the distillation of lemon balm.Applications:as micellar water - cleanses, moisturizes, tones and refreshes the skin, helps against acnehelps with depression, anxiety and insomniain aromatherapy - calms the nerves and reduces stress, insomnia, restores clarity of perception, harmonizes the body and mindas a tonic - refreshes and tones (sprayed on your face, palms or around to enjoy the citrus, lemon-like scent)reduces redness and irritation after shaving or hair removal (waxing, depilation), commonly used as an aftershave
